parameters.name: BShowErrorMsg
parameters.description: True to show any error messages in a dialog or false to avoid these dialogs (that is, data directory could not be found messages)

title: ISldWorks.GetDataFolder
description: Gets the data directory name currently used by SOLIDWORKS Design.

parameters.name: BShowErrorMsg
parameters.description: True to show any error messages in a dialog or false to avoid these dialogs (that is, data directory could not be found messages)

returns: Data directory currently used by the SOLIDWORKS Design application
